title: Shadowrun 5E Datasteal Anarchy - Updated 08 Oct 2016
description:
Connecting to JackPoint VPN...
...Identity Spoofed
...Encryption Keys Generated
...Connected to Onion Routers
>>>Login: XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
>>>Enter Passcode: XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
...Biometric Scan Confirmed
You're in. Use it well.


Hoi, chummer.

The Matrix is abuzz with complaints about the previous datafile of Anarchy having some issues.  This forced the small corp, Catalyst Game Labs, to issue an updated version of the PDF.  This datasteal contains the 08 October 2016 Update PDF version of the new narrative-focused alternative setting called Shadowrun: Anarchy.


Some of the changes:

Drones and Vehicles are now Shadow Amps, rather than Gear, and have armor and damage listed under their Amp entry.
A Basic Technomancer Sprite is now listed in the NPC section.
There is a spell-cost table as well.

More information here: http://forums.shadowruntabletop.com/index.php?topic=25042


Enjoy omae
